title: Intercambio_app
author: Intercambio_app
content: Today we're announcing Intercambio.appAvailable also on:Tor: http://ybnc7t4gnaixrvawshppx6nauxrvyxf4nmppfk74ztqgd46q3ifjl4id.onion/I2P: http://yineeyt77uncalpxufaivt44mba4uqs2envz4hqqajspceojb3ha.b32.i2p/If you're trading a crypto that's unavailable on many services like BTC on LN or Wownero then Intercambio.app can also create multi-part trades. Such as:Code:BTCLN->LTC with FixedFloat immediately sent to LTC->WOW with MajesticBankThis makes it possible to easily trade rarer cryptos against the most popular onesAside from just finding the best rate Intercambio.app allows you to prioritize the KYC grade (sourced from kycnot.me) and thus get the best privacy for your trade.You can also select to only use Never-KYC services that either never ask KYC question or will refund if you refuse to answer them.Although JavaScript is not required, if you have it enabled you'll be able to install the Intercambio app within the browser of any device.Intercambio.app is jointly developed by OrangeFren.com & MajesticBank.sc, if you have feedback we'd love to hear it!
